content.en: Enhanced navigation algorithms: Researchers have investigated various algorithms to improve the performance of integrated navigation systems that combine inertial sensors and GPS. These algorithms, such as the adaptive Kalman filter and the Unscented Kalman filter, have been found to outperform conventional filters by tuning system noise and handling sensor uncertainties. Additionally, algorithms like the adaptive H-infinity filter and the interval Kalman filter have been developed to manage model uncertainties, outliers, and high uncertainties, resulting in improved navigation accuracy.
content.da: Forbedrede navigationsalgoritmer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre ydeevnen af integrerede navigationssystemer, der kombinerer inertialsensorer og GPS. Disse algoritmer, som den adaptive Kalman-filter og den unscented Kalman-filter, har vist sig at overgå konventionelle filtre ved at justere systemstøj og håndtere sensorusikkerheder. Derudover er algoritmer som den adaptive H-infinity filter og intervall Kalman-filter blevet udviklet til at håndtere modelusikkerheder, outliers og høje usikkerheder, hvilket resulterer i forbedret navigationsnøjagtighed.
